message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40.  It's important to settle this quickly because the value of the money decreases with each round.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the money will lose value for both of us in the next round.  Let's make this happen!
Bob, let's be reasonable. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. I understand you want a larger share, but the money is losing value rapidly for me with each round. This is my final offer.
